concept.title: Notifications
concept.shortdesc: This setting controls the Sametime notifications. If you are on an Android 8 or newer device this opens the system notification panel for the app. If on an Android 6 or 7 device, it opens the application notification panel.

conbody.draft-comment: This topic needs work. doesn't match UI.
conbody.p: For Android 8 and newer device the system notification options are:

ul.li: Announcement – Enabled by default, controls notifications when an incoming announcement is received
Chat – Enabled by default, controls notifications when an incoming message is received
Invitations – Enabled by default, controls notifications when an incoming invite, such as when you are invited to join a group, is received
Status – Enabled by default, controls notifications for status changes

conbody.p: For Android 6 and 7 devices, the following notification settings are available:

ul.li: Enable sound – Enabled by default, this plays a notification sound for any incoming notification, such as a message, invitation or announcement
Enable vibration – Enabled by default, it vibrates the device for an incoming notification
Enable light – Enabled by default, it flashs the device LED for an incoming notification
